documentation.text:
@notice delegate approval 
 @dev check the balance is above value, then emit approval

@notice transfer from holder if approved
 @dev check the balance is above value, then emit transfer

devdoc.author: Selim Sahnoun
devdoc.details: This is an experimental contract, no real estate goods are linked to it

allowContract(address).details: This contract is unique and no other contract will be allowed

approve(address,uint256).details: check the balance is above value, then emit approval

constructor.details: The Admin and token supply will never change

params._initialSupply: Amount of token to be initialized in the contract, it will never change

offerTransfer(address,address,uint256).details: check that the contract is allowed to make transfer, then the balance and do the transfer

transfer(address,uint256).details: check the balance is above value, then do the transfer from sender to receiver

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: check the balance is above value, then emit transfer

devdoc.title: ERC 20 inspired token of real estate goods

allowContract(address).notice: unique contract that will be allowed to do tokens transfer

offerTransfer(address,address,uint256).notice: transfer tokens from seller to buyer according to an offer

transfer(address,uint256).notice: transfer tokens from a holder to another

userdoc.notice: ERC 20 inspired token of real estate goods. You can use this contract for only the most basic simulation
